lead_paragraph: Confirming rumors that circulated on Friday, Condé Nast announced on Monday that Adam Rapoport has been named the next editor in chief of Bon Appétit. Mr. Rapoport lives in New York and is currently style editor at GQ, where he has worked for more than 10 years. Prior to that he was the restaurant editor at Time Out New York, and an editor and writer in the publications department of the James Beard Foundation.
snippet: The new editor is style editor at GQ.

headline.main: Adam Rapoport Will Lead Bon Appétit, Publisher Confirms

abstract: The new editor is style editor at GQ.
